summary: The Open Library package provides the core infrastructure for the Open Library platform, including command-line actions, an API client for managing bibliographic records, web application routing and rendering utilities, configuration parsing, application initialization, and pytest fixtures for testing.
business_intent: To enable developers to build, interact with, and test the Open Library service, allowing seamless retrieval, creation, updating, and batch processing of bibliographic data via both web interfaces and programmatic API calls.
